main event: A round, white object, resembling the size of a first magnitude star, was observed moving steadily upward and disappeared behind low clouds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a total of 13 minutes,The observer's location was approximately 8 miles east of Corpus Christi, Texas, The object was seen at an apparent altitude of 38 degrees, There are no confirmed other sightings or unusual activities in the area at the time, A check indicated that the satellite Echo I was moving toward the path of this sighting.
